name: Romance's Miracle
desc: Spend 100 points of Energy to use this ability and trigger Boundary Resonance with the Path of Propagation. Causes one designated ally to immediately take action and recovers 5 Skill Point(s). Gains the "Levitation" effect. When any enemy unit is defeated by a character with "Levitation," Boundary Equation regenerates 50 Energy, with the Max Energy set at 200.
